name: Billing
description: Contract to allow generate Invoice which can be paid by others.

eventDecorators.name: InvoiceCancelled
eventDecorators.description: Emitted every time an order is broadcasted.

eventDecorators.name: InvoiceCreated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted every time an order is broadcasted.

eventDecorators.name: InvoicePaid
eventDecorators.description: Emitted every time an order is broadcasted.

eventDecorators.name: OwnerSet
eventDecorators.description: Emitted every time an order is broadcasted.

eventDecorators.name: Paused
eventDecorators.description: Emitted every time an order is broadcasted.

eventDecorators.name: Unpaused
eventDecorators.description: Emitted every time an order is broadcasted.

functionDecorators.name: canCancelInvoice
functionDecorators.description: Function to check if the invoice can be cancelled.

returnDecorators.description: boolean value if the invoice can be cancelled by the caller.

functionDecorators.name: canIPayTheInvoice
functionDecorators.description: Function to check if the invoice is payable.

returnDecorators.description: boolean value if the invoice can be paid.

functionDecorators.name: cancelInvoice
functionDecorators.description: Function to check if the invoice can be cancelled.

returnDecorators.description: boolean value if the invoice is cancelled.

functionDecorators.name: createInvoice
functionDecorators.description: When invoice creator creates the invoice for Someoneelse.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the token which token is to be transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAmountInWei
parameterDecorators.description: Number of tokens to be paid in smallest decimal of the token.

parameterDecorators.name: receiver
parameterDecorators.description: the receiver who will receive the tokens.

functionDecorators.name: createInvoice
functionDecorators.description: When invoice creator creates the invoice for themselves.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the token which token is to be transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAmountInWei
parameterDecorators.description: Number of tokens to be paid in smallest decimal of the token.

returnDecorators.name: tokenAddress
returnDecorators.description: Address of the token which token is to be transferred.

returnDecorators.name: tokenAmountInWei
returnDecorators.description: Number of tokens to be paid in smallest decimal of the token.

returnDecorators.name: receiver
returnDecorators.description: Address who should be paying for the invoice.

returnDecorators.name: isPaidBy
returnDecorators.description: Who paid for the stream, 0x00 if unpaid.

functionDecorators.name: getNextInvoiceID
functionDecorators.description: Return next Invoice ID, useful for making stream links.

functionDecorators.name: paused
functionDecorators.description: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

returnDecorators.description: boolean value if the invoice got paid.
